channel.title: How do i port forward? and how do i get it to go on moparscape server status?
channel.description: Well i need to know how to portforward i really don't know how if you know how to do belkin it would help but if not just give me an example because i am really tired of moparscape telling me im offline and ive been editing this server for about 8 months and i am about to realease it because i cant get it up online so please everyone don't make me realese :( :( :( :(

item.title: How do i port forward? and how do i get it to go on moparscape server status?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

download utorrent, run it and go to options>preferences>connection, then put port 43594 and apply and close utorrent

then to get on server status, make sure your server is online,
then click register server, making sure that your logged in on moparscape. and fill in the details,

it’ll ask you to make sure an account is readily available. just login with the username and pass they supply then simply log back out.

if they can successfully log in… they will put your server up, if not. it wont show up

Read full topic
item.source: How do i port forward? and how do i get it to go on moparscape server status?
